solution_line_template: She rode {hours_per_weekday_session} hour every Monday, Wednesday and Friday each week so every week she rode {hours_per_weekday_session}*{num_weekday_sessions} = <<{hours_per_weekday_session}*{num_weekday_sessions}={initial_hours_mon_wed_fri}>>{initial_hours_mon_wed_fri} hours

She rode {minutes_per_tue_thu_session} min on Tuesday and Thursday each week for a total of {minutes_per_tue_thu_session}*{num_tue_thu_sessions} = <<{minutes_per_tue_thu_session}*{num_tue_thu_sessions}={minutes_tue_thu}>>{minutes_tue_thu} min or {hours_tue_thu} hour

On Mon, Wed & Friday she rode {initial_hours_mon_wed_fri} hours, {hours_tue_thu} hour total on Tue and Thur and {hours_saturday} hours on Sat for a total of {initial_hours_mon_wed_fri}+{hours_tue_thu}+{hours_saturday} = <<{initial_hours_mon_wed_fri}+{hours_tue_thu}+{hours_saturday}={total_hours_per_week}>>{total_hours_per_week} hours

She rode {total_hours_per_week} hours per week for {num_weeks} weeks so in total she rode {total_hours_per_week}*{num_weeks} = <<{total_hours_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_hours_two_weeks}>>{total_hours_two_weeks} hours
